verses.name: Genesis 6:7
verses.text: And the Lord said, I will destroy man whom I have created from the face of the earth; both man, and beast, and the creeping thing, and the fowls of the air; for it repenteth me that I have made them.

verses.name: Genesis 6:8
verses.text: But Noah found grace in the eyes of the Lord.

verses.name: Genesis 6:9
verses.text: These are the generations of Noah: Noah was a just man and perfect in his generations, and Noah walked with God.

verses.name: Genesis 6:10
verses.text: And Noah begat three sons, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

verses.name: Genesis 6:11
verses.text: The earth also was corrupt before God, and the earth was filled with violence.
